name: The Concept-Grasping Magical Genius
author: 김정글
content: Pauline became a mother figure to Rowan, who had lost everything. After Pauline left, Rowan grieved her and awakened to a power called &#039Mana&#039. What&#039s more, Rowan could even see the Mana of other people! Through mana, even though he&#039s apart from Pauline, he can always feel like she&#039s with him...One day, Rowan encounters a shocking sight of Pauline, who he believed had left for a noble family.
